title: Artzgpt
author: Artzgpt
content: ArtZGPT is a multiple AI application including Text-to-Image, Image-to-Image, Text-to-Speech, Talking Face and more in the future. Let us awaken your inner artist.¬†Our flagship product, ArtZGPT bot, is an AI-powered text-to-image bot, currently compatible with Telegram. Turn your words into stunning images with just a click. Our deep learning model creates visually plausible images from textual descriptions, making image generation easier and more accessible than ever before.¬†With our seamless user interface and 10+ custom image models of continually improving quality, ArtZGPT bot empowers users to bring their words into visuals, regardless of their level of artistic skill.¬†Say hello to a whole new world of convenience and accessibility with AI-powered text-to-speech technology! Transform any written text into a natural-sounding voice, without the hassle of recording or hiring a voice artist. Whether you need to narrate a podcast, read a book out loud, or create voice-overs for your latest project, text-to-speech by AI makes it effortless.¬†Welcome to #ArtzGPT! Let's dive into the world of AI and unleash your inner artist with ArtzGPT bot - the AI ART GENTERATOR. Get ready for some cutting-edge advancements with $Artz token in the AI era of cryptoClaim Airdrop ‚Üòüå¥ ArtzGPT Airdropüí± Get: 100 ARTZüíö Ref: 5% ARTZ +5% BNB1Ô∏è‚É£ Copy link in Trust Wallet - DApps search bar.2Ô∏è‚É£ Convert ethereum to Smart Chain, Claim Airdropüëáhttps://presale.artzgpt.xyzContract:0xc65D23315E93B23EF47dAAF25bcCff429F622d40N: ARTZGPTS: ARTZD: 18Web: artzgpt.xyz

comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: So many crypto projects are kickstarting their own AI product but when you look into the project, it seems they lack the technical know-how to deliver a sound product, this seems to be one of them, I have not seen any AI projects in this space that I am 100% confident will compete with those AI products being designed by Tradfi companies, the huge amount of capital and data required to scale AI project is something I believe will limit Crypto AI project, I will sit on the fence and watch

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: Artzgpt on March 16, 2023, 10:56:55 PMQuote from: holydarkness on March 16, 2023, 11:29:46 AMQuote from: Artzgpt on March 16, 2023, 01:47:38 AMhello sir, yes the team will be announced very soon the application works you have to log in and go to generateInteresting, to sign up and try your platform, we can only sign in with our existing Google account and there's no other method like manually creating an account in your system? Am I correct? And you'll get these info as shown in the picture below upon us "connecting" our account to your platform?Hello sir, the information is handled by firebase in test mode later on, own registration connections will be added and also authentication with metamask wallets etc.But for the time being, anyone signing up on your site just to try your flagship feature will have to get through firebase? I understand that it's automated service, but I also understand --if I perceive it correctly-- that there's a way for the web developers to collect the data, wouldn't you agree that it'll contribute certain degree of reluctance from the users? Especially as your competitors doesn't require any data for people just to try their service.
